name: Derrick BARNES, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Barnes v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Derrick BARNES, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of July, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief and the Application for an Immediate Hearing are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
48 A.3d 1244
Derrick BARNES, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 84 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 19, 2012.
